text.en: Discard 1 card; place 1 "Humid Winds", "Dried Winds", or "Blessed Winds" from your hand or Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 Plant Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing materials mentioned on it from your hand and/or field. If your LP are higher than your opponent's, you can also banish Plant monsters from your GY as material. You can only use each effect of "Aroma Blend" once per turn.
